Rusty Dagger.name: Rusty Dagger
Rusty Dagger.description: A brittle, old dagger.  Doesn't look too intimidating.

Ice Storm Scepter.name: Ice Storm Scepter
Ice Storm Scepter.description: Once a gift to the king, this ornamented staff blasts a radius of ice particles.

Wave of Knives.name: Wave of Knives
Wave of Knives.description: A warrior's incantation, this spell shoots knives in all directions around you.
